text: Reversal of Fortune is a 1990 drama movie. It was adapted off a 1985 novel. Jeremy Irons plays Claus von B端low. Glenn Close plays Sunny von B端low. The movie is based on the true story of the unexplained coma of socialite Sunny von B端low. It is about the attempted murder trial and the acquittal of her husband Claus von B端low. The movie was released on October 17, 1990 in the United States. title: Reversal of Fortune
